items.name: Unique Programming
entries: Gearbox's unique programming allows the modron to function as an {@item Orb of Direction|XGE} and an {@item Orb of Time|XGE}, to cast the {@spell light} cantrip at will, and to grant other characters advantage on Dexterity checks made with thieves' tools and on ability checks made to identify or operate mechanical or laboratory equipment.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Gearbox can cast the {@spell light} cantrip at will.
